comments.content: After two attempts at gencon and two more last fall in Pennsylvania my wife and I invited ten allies to our home to face the Siege of Annuminas: epic multiplayer mode.  The first game of the day ended in disaster when staging area a/b threated out due to location lock.  The second however ended in the narrowest of victories with the city only having 6hp remaining.  It really was epic and will go down as perhaps my favorite LotR lcg experience.
